amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used in contravention of certain laws enacted or regulations promulgated to implement the UN Contravention Against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new section att the end of the bill to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used in contravention of ther following laws enacted or regulations promulgated to implement the UUnited Nations Convention Against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment (done at New York in December 10, 1984).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
